titleStmt.title: A plea for the King, and kingdome; by way of answer to the late remonstrance of the Army, presented to the House of Commons on Monday Novemb. 20. Proving, that it tends to subvert the lawes, and fundamentall constitutions of this kingdom, and demolish the very foundations of government in generall.
titleStmt.author: Nedham, Marchamont, 1620-1678.

titleStmt.title: A plea for the King, and kingdome; by way of answer to the late remonstrance of the Army, presented to the House of Commons on Monday Novemb. 20. Proving, that it tends to subvert the lawes, and fundamentall constitutions of this kingdom, and demolish the very foundations of government in generall.
titleStmt.author: Nedham, Marchamont, 1620-1678.

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: Mercurius Pragmaticus, i.e. Marchamont Nedham.
A variant has the text to sig. D wrongly set in the following order: p. 21, 26, 27, 24, 25, 22, 23, 28.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
